column4: I have an interesting network related problem if someone who is knowledgeable would like to help out :)
what do you need this for?
I'm behind a university firewall. I have a VPN that forwards ports so I can break out of it, but it's no good if my game doesn't bind to the VPN device (which it doesn't by default)
can you ssh to your VPN IP?
and thinking that ssh client probably uses TCP, then here you go
unop, Robbie_Crash: I have an idea
IF those users connect to your real IP, maybe some routing on you local part will help?
There's not anything I can do, the ports are all firewalled
The only way to get around it is a tunnel
I'm sure it probably does, but that doesn't help me at all :)
they weren't thinking about you. They are thinking about making money.
